short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides all suggestions for the time being and offers to show them again on request.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you quickly distracted by YouTube's suggestions? 
Then this extension is just right for you! It hides all suggestions for the time being and offers to show them again on request.
